com.firebase.jobdispatcher

Class ValidationEnforcer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.firebase.jobdispatcher.ValidationEnforcer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobValidator

    public class ValidationEnforcer
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobValidator
    Wraps a JobValidator and provides helpful validation utilities.

    • Nested Class Summary
